name: nzb-dav
description: NZBDav adds WebDAV access to your NZB download folder. It acts as a bridge making downloads accessible via WebDAV clients or cloud sync services like Nextcloud or rClone, ideal in self-hosted media stacks.

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Expose NZB download folders via WebDAV protocol for universal access

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Connect with Nextcloud, ownCloud, or rClone for automatic syncing

features.title: File Access
features.description: Browse and download completed NZB files from any WebDAV-compatible client

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Seamlessly integrate with Sonarr, Radarr, and other automation tools

features.title: Authentication
features.description: Secure access with username and password protection
